1.content: The 1 foot tall yellow-orange dino known as gon is about to have a gluttonous adventure. but were is he?
1.title: Gon's adventure to get a big belly

choices: Gon finds some small animals to eat.
Gon finds some animals his size to eat.
Gon finds animals bigger than himself, but they do look tastey.
Gon runs into something bigger than himself.  He better run.
11.content: Gon ventured through the thick jungles of the Amazon. All the while he kept his eyes out for anything that might jump out and eat him. He patted his stomach to keep it quiet. He was out searching for a meal. Gon knew the only rule in here was to eat or be eaten, but he wasn't prepared to be anywhere, but on the top of the food chain.
11.title: Eat or be Eaten

113.content: What animal does he encounter?
113.title: big prey

12.content: What is gon doing right now?
12.title: The ocean

122.content: Gon is peacefully swimming along side the beach. he smiles at the warm, bright sun and rubs his slightly plump belly. looking over at a sound he sees...
122.title: gon swimmin

choices: backward ( his butt is outside the maw)
oops, he is curled forward, so that his rump and head stick out!
1222.content: seeing the large carnivorous sea creature, gon manages to stop himself from being eaten completely, but he still is stuck in the mouth. holding himself stationary with his short feet, Gon notices that he is facing...
1222.title: shark!

choices: more octopuses, including a really big one!
12221.content: the shark ignores Gon in his throat and goes after an octopus, hoping that this meal will shove gon into his belly. Gon notices and opens his own mouth, and feels a large round and squishy ball in his mouth. the octopus's head is soon sent to gon's hungry belly and the tentacles wiggle all the way down making gon shudder happily. it also triggers him to force the shark into going after more food by pressing it's jaw muscles and steering it. soon Gon sees...
12221.title: gon gets octopi food

choices: Gon searches for other food for now.
122212.content:
Gon never knew one could control where a shark swims from within its mouth, but then again he didn't know anybody stupid enough to try it on purpose. Gon didn't think he'd be able to get out of his situation any time soon or he'd just be attack by the shark again, but he liked the situation he was in right now. He saw the a school of octopi nearby and figured his previous meal that was still wiggling within him was probably one that strayed away. He figured the best thing he could now was reunite the group in his stomach. He directed the shark to the closest one and catches it in the shark's mouth and just like before he gulped it down.
After that the octipi had begun swimming away out of fear of being eaten, but this proved futile. Gon just saw this as more practice for him as he snagged one after another in his stomach. After a dozen or so Gon didn't see anymore, save for the large one that was probably calm that it wasn't a target of the shark. Gon's stomach had grown quite large. It caused the shark's mouth to open wider as it was starting to have trouble restraining Gon. Gon looked up at the giant octopus. It looked tastey, but he already felt a little stuffed. He wasn't sure if he'd be able to eat it even if he was starving. Gon could always save him for later and go after something else or he could tangle with the octopus now if he wanted to.
122212.title: Hot Wired Shark

choices: the shark trys using a swordfish to shove gon in further.
same as above, only with a dolphin
12222.content: looking straight into the gullet of the shark, Gon's tail raises in panic at being so close to being snack food. he then feels something ram right into his tailhole. gasping in surprise, he accidentally pulls the unfortunate fish into his hole. grunting, Gon sucks the fish into his bowels but the feeling of the fish's consumption made him lose grip enough to slip a little more into the throat.
12222.title: about face!

choices: finds a fat wolf eating an equally fat wild boar
gets challenged by a plump raccoon at an eating contest
sees a beaver AVing a weasel
13.content: walking idly around the forest, Gon...
13.title: generic forest

choices: Gon decides to make a food chain
132.content: coming to a clearing, gon hears a strange, loud, gulping noise. following the sound, he eventually sees an extremely overweight wolf swallowing a wild boar of equal girth. both of the very plump animals fail to notice the hungry dino behind them.
132.title: finds a fat wolf eating an equally fat wild boar

1322.content:
Gon decided to help the Wolf since he had the wild boar up to below his belly in his maw. When Gon stepped into the Wolf's line of view, he locked eyes with the Wolf. He moves in front of the wild boar and starts pushing him into the Wolf's maw.

The Wolf opens his mouth to accommodate the wild boar's huge gut. As Gon pushes the wild boar, his belly starts to vanish in the Wolf's maw. The Wolf gets half of the wild boar's belly in his mouth. The rest of the wild boar's belly finally enters the Wolf's maw.

Gon stops helping the Wolf as the Wolf gets to the wild boar's front legs. He tries to lift his head a few times to swallow the rest of the wild boar. On the fourth try he manages to lift his head up toward the sky, and with that gravity starts pulling the wild boar down to the Wolf's massive stomach. The wild boar's head slides into the Wolf's ravenous maw, and then his legs follow after. A few more massive gulps and the Wolf's belly has swelled out to appalling proportions.

Finally with that done Gon's eyes rake over the Wolf particularly his huge furry gut with the wild boar in it. Gon notices that the wild boar is struggling for dear life as he sees the Wolf's sagging belly sway. He then hears his stomach start to growl. He grinned as the huge-bellied Wolf realized that he had no chance of escape. Gon licked his lips as he approached the Wolf and his delicious, huge paunch...
1322.title: Gon Assists the Wolf

choices: sees a huge bear bullying a smaller bear
135.title: more forest events

152.content: Gon follows the odd scent of something in the air, only to discover a farm! looking at the animals in the distance he walks until he finds the first animal he sees, which is...
152.title: barnyard

info.brief_description: The world's smallest dino becomes the hungriest!
info.description:
this is an interactive in which the dinosaur, Gon, gets hungry in some way or another.

almost any vore is allowed, except hard vore.

in vore instances, gon can be pred or prey.

if you have any questions about this or any other interactive, email me.
